description: Relegation-threatened Cambridge United have to settle for a draw with Northampton Town, who move seven points clear of the drop zone.
title: Cambridge United 1-1 Northampton Town
title_page: Cambridge United 1-1 Northampton Town - U's fight back to earn point - BBC Sport
maintext:
Cambridge United are unbeaten across their last four home Football League games against Northampton Town (W3 D1), since a 1-0 defeat in October 2004.
Northampton Town are unbeaten across their last four league games against Cambridge United (W2 D2) and will be looking to go five without defeat for the first time in the EFL.
Cambridge have won just seven of their 38 league games this season (D9 L22), though five of those victories have come on home soil.
Northampton have won just one of their last six league games (D3 L2), though that sole victory did come in their last away match â€“ a 2-1 win at Leyton Orient.
